welcome_benefits: TataCliQ Voucher Worth ₹2,000, EaseMyTrip Vouchers Worth ₹2,000, Croma Vouchers Worth ₹1,000, and EazyDiner 3-Month Prime Membership

Movie & Dining: 25% Discount Up to ₹150 on Movie Bookings Made With BookMyShow and INOX (Twice Each Month)
Rewards Rate: 4 RPs/₹100 on International Spends, 2 RPs/₹100 on Domestic Spends and 1 RP/₹100 Spent on Insurance and Utilities
Reward Redemption: Redeem Points for Vouchers and More. 1 Reward Point = ₹0.25
Travel: 8 Free Railway Lounge Visits Each Year
Domestic Lounge Access: 2 Airport Lounge Visits Each Quarter on Spends of ₹75,000 or More in the Previous Quarter
Golf: Up to 2 Complimentary Golf Lessons/Rounds Each Month (Spend Based)
Insurance Benefits: Personal Air Accident Cover Worth ₹1 Crore and Several Other Travel Insurances

fees_charges.Spend-Based Waiver: Spend ₹3 Lakh or More Each Year to Waive Annual Charges
fees_charges.Fuel Surcharge: 1% Waiver on Fuel Spends Between ₹400 and ₹4,000
fees_charges.Cash Advance Charges: Higher of ₹500 or 2.5% of the Amount Withdrawn

product_details: 2 Reward Points/₹100 spent domestically & 4 Reward Points/₹100 spent internationally.
1 Reward Point on every ₹100 spent on utilities and insurance categories
Travel and shopping vouchers worth over ₹5,000 as a welcome benefit.
25% discount (up to ₹150) on booking a minimum of 2 movie tickets in a single transaction on BookMyShow or Inox (max 2 times in a month- once with each variant).
Exciting discount offers on dining with the ICICI Bank Culinary Treats Program.
Exclusive insurance benefits including a personal air accident cover worth ₹1 crore and lost card liability protection worth ₹50,000.
24*7 concierge service i-Assist for hotel reservations, flight/movie ticket bookings, gift delivery assistance, etc.
Spends-based renewal fee waiver on the expenditure of ₹3 lakh in the previous year.
Additional reward points will be awarded for achieving the stipulated spend-based milestones.
